about_the_game: The soundtrack of Syndeo-Complex contains 12 tracks composed by ddzevprod. Each of them offers a particular atmosphere that will help the player to better immerse himself in the game's universe. Mainly electro, the soundtrack will sometimes have a soft and melancholic tone during exploration, sometimes industrial metal to accompany epic fights!
detailed_description: The soundtrack of Syndeo-Complex contains 12 tracks composed by ddzevprod. Each of them offers a particular atmosphere that will help the player to better immerse himself in the game's universe. Mainly electro, the soundtrack will sometimes have a soft and melancholic tone during exploration, sometimes industrial metal to accompany epic fights!
name: Syndeo-Complex Soundtrack
short_description: The soundtrack of Syndeo-Complex contains 12 tracks composed by ddzevprod.
